definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
handsome high-powered businessman (a type of character in an eponymous genre of romantic fiction who typically has a soft spot for a girl of lower social status)
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
the design of a character (in games, manga etc) (abbr. for 人物設定|人物设定)/(fig.) (a celebrity or other public figure's) image in the eyes of the public/public persona
reserved/aloof/(geography) (of a location) elevated and cold
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
